_comment: This is where you will add your levels. If they are not added, they won't show up in Taze Adam. Paths start from '/tzadam/'. You don't have to store your levels in 'Levels/'.
_comment2: Make sure that the metadata for levels is the same as in the files. The script can manage the metadata for you.
_comment3: The metadata shown here will be used in the level browser. The metadata in the files will be used when the user saves the level.
